title: Why remove Face of The Mountain?
body: I am asking this primarily from a Thresh support perspective, why remove Face of The Mountain? To me it makes no sense. The patch notes legit say its so that they can combine Eye of the Equinox and Face of The Mountain, which really just feels like its taking away different options of play. ADC's are squishy but do a lot of damage, it's what they do. As a support its my job to keep my ADC alive. Playing as Thresh I already have an ability that shields my ADC, however if I waste it for a shield I lose a way to save my ADC. Having Face's active is extremely useful so that I can negate as much damage to my ADC during early fights and still have my lantern to escape with. Now the only thing that I have is the Targons Brace heal passive, that now heals for half it normally does since Thresh is ranged. As a Thresh main one of the things I do is engage by hooking into a group of enemies and flaying them towards my team so we can clap'em. This requires me to build tanky no matter what so that I don't get immediately killed the moment I go in. Face's reward was nice late game because it gave me more cushion when I'd engage, now i just have wards which I could've taken with Eye if I wanted to. In short Face of The Mountain synced well with Thresh and I don't like a company whose game is structured around options to take away usability from my favorite champion.

replies.body: But now you have quicker access to {{item:3190}}
Nobody used it except a few hipsters. Hopefully it will return in an easier-to-use form, when the other support item actives do.
They currently said it's unlikely to come back because of its low usage.
I hate it too but apparently they're working on new items to replace all old supp item actives, including FotM.
